privacy_policy.label: U.S. Privacy Notice for Consumers
privacy_policy.desc: This Notice explains how we collect, share, use, and protect information when you visit or use the Sites/Services. We advise you to read the Notice in its entirety, including the jurisdiction-specific provisions in the appendix to this Notice, which will apply to users in certain jurisdictions. By using the Sites/Services, you agree to this Privacy Notice.

optout.optout_label: YOUR CHOICES REGARDING YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION
